skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Proficient in developing interactive websites with React.js, styling with CSS, and understanding of web markup with HTML5

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Experience in working with Supabase, connecting back-end to front-end, and implementing user-authentification

skills.title: Data Science
skills.description: Proficient in creating data visualizations with R, Python, and Tableau. Familiar with regression models, random forest, and natural language processing.

portfolio.title: University Threads
portfolio.description: A website for clothing exchange between college students in the greater Boston area. I worked on both the front-end build, css styling, and the back-end user authentification component of the login and signup pages

portfolio.title: Eating Disorder Awareness Website
portfolio.description: A website to bring awareness to eating disorders. This was the first interactive webstie I built. I used HTML, CSS, and Javascript to build this website on Replit.

portfolio.title: Covid-19 Mental Health Dashboard
portfolio.description: A dashboard of data visualizations centered around the relationship between Covid-19 and mental health. Created using a combination of R's ggplot library and Tableau. Dashboard is compiled through Wix.

portfolio.title: NYC Gun-ownership Data Analysis Project
portfolio.description: A group data analysis project analyzing NYC gun-ownership and demographic factors. Using LASSO regression and random forest to abstract the most important variables in predicting gun-ownership. Presented our findings at the 2022 Women in Data Science Conference hosted by the University of Pennsylvania

experiences.title: Teaching Assistant - Fundamentals of Computer Science 1
experiences.description: Worked in a software developer team to design the frontend of the full-stack web application, Finishline, for automation of club management. Implement and maintain Finishline features with Typescript and React to respond to the needs of other subteams

experiences.title: Northeastern Electric Racing Software Developer
experiences.description: Worked in a software developer team to design the frontend of the full-stack web application, Finishline, for automation of club management. Implement and maintain Finishline features with Typescript and React to respond to the needs of other subteams

experiences.title: Oasis Member
experiences.description: Worked in a group in developing our own interactive website University Threads. Attended weekly hack sessions. Utilized the sprint method in Agile product development.
